author: foxnews.com
title: Greta: An apology to Christie - he did not hug Obama | On Air
text: Greta: An apology to Christie - he did not hug Obama Aug. 13, 2015 - 1:07 - 'Off the Record,' 8/13/15: Nearly three years after Sandy and after reviewing pictures and video, it is time to fix a wrong. NJ Gov. Chris Christie merely extended his hand to President Obama and did not hug him.
